afterExecuteDay(Simulator.Outcome) - Method in interface com.epidemic_simulator.SimulatorCallBack
This method is called every time the Simulator finishes the simulation of a day.
It can be useful for cctivating a strategy every day, or for running the Simulator in another Thread, and having callbacks.

I

immune - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is immune to the disease and can't be infected.
infect(int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
This method effectively infect this Person.
The person is infected by setting their Person.infected to true.

This method also decides the future development of the disease for this person.
It will extract a booleans based on the symptomsRate and if it's true it will decide the day on which this person will develop Person.symptoms.
infected - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is infected and its disease status will be updated everyday.
infectionRate - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
 
initialResources - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator

J

javaNameToUserString(String) - Static method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Utils
This functions convert a method or a class name into a human readable string.
It only works with strings that do not contains special characters.
Example: animalCageBuilder - Animal cage builder

Simulator.Outcome - Enum in com.epidemic_simulator
Enum for the possible outcomes of a day execution.
SimulatorCallBack - Interface in com.epidemic_simulator
This interface declares the methods necessary for the Simulator to issue ecallbacks to an object.
NOTE: The Simulator only calls the methods of the SimulatorCallBacks that are registered.
NOTE: The Simulator never calls methods of a Strategy before the first red person has been found.

Strategy - Class in com.epidemic_simulator

Strategy.ParameterData - Annotation Type in com.epidemic_simulator
 
StrategyForbiddenAccessException - Exception in com.epidemic_simulator.exceptions
This Exception can be thrown when trying to access data that the Strategy shouldn't access at all.
It is a RuntimeException so there's no need to surround all the function calls to Simulator getters with try/catch.

This should never be thrown unless a Strategy try to do an illegal operation.
(For example accessing the number of yellows without testing them)
StrategyForbiddenAccessException(String) - Constructor for exception com.epidemic_simulator.exceptions.StrategyForbiddenAccessException
Instantiates a new Strategy forbidden access exception.
symptoms - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is showing symptoms of the disease.
symptomsDevelopmentDay - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
The number of the day in which this person will develop symptoms.
If this person will not develop symptoms it is is -1 by default.
symptomsRate - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator

testVirus(Person) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
This method test the virus inside a Person, the virus will only be detected if the person it's already at a stage at which he can infect other people.
TimeCheck() - Method in class strategies.MediumControlledLockdown
 
tryInfect(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
This method is called every time an Person.infected person and a not infected one meets.
This method extract a boolean based on infectionRate, if it's true then it proceed to call Person.infect(int, int, int, int, int)

Utils - Class in com.epidemic_simulator
Utility class for the Epidemic Simulator project.
It contains some method for extracting random numbers easily, some other for reflections and some utilities for UI.
